website_summaries.verdict: Despite the change in perspective, Resident Evil 7 is a triumphant return to form, delivering the tense action and classic B-movie camp that made the series iconic.
pros: Fantastic gameplay that perfectly straddles the line between action and survival
Slower movement and a defensive focus keeps encounters tense
cons: Randomized enemy spawning can be frustrating at times

customer_reviews.title: A refreshing entry in what had become a tired series
customer_reviews.text: A solid game that starts out strong but goes downhill fast after the player escapes from the plantation house and abandons its Texas Chainsaw atmosphere and aesthetic for the utterly cliché "young dark-haired girl with supernatural powers" trope and the less interesting environs of a wrecked tanker and salt mine. It also has very little replay value due to the abundance of scripted sequences, static puzzles and almost complete lack of meaningful player choice. All that said you'll have a blast on your first play-through and it's certainly better than the last entry in the main series.
customer_reviews.author: Max Bell

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent, but it bore some striking similarities to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent, but it bore some striking similarities to the original F.E.A.R game, so could have come up with some more of its own ideas however it does have some great ideas and implements them well, it's fun and the story is gripping, the gameplay I think is one of the best fps implementations I've ever played. It's atmospheric, and that's even without vr! Turn the graphics up to break your computer though, played on medium settings, really feeling I need an upgrade soon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and exactly as described. As for the quality of the game itself, I can't really comment as I haven't got around to playing it. That said, this product redeems on Steam and if you want to see reviews of the game itself I would suggest checking out the store page over there. The only things I'm rating here are the actions of the seller and the accuracy of the product description, and regarding both I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Creepy and once again the graphics are very good. I must admit I normally get through games ...
customer_reviews.text: Creepy and once again the graphics are very good. I must admit I normally get through games on the middle level with a bit of time, but I am struggling to complete some of the levels in this one. One thing I am finding , is that you do have to go back a long way if you get killed during a level - However still worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Birch

customer_reviews.title: Good old, scare.
customer_reviews.text: After having played Bio-hazard / Resident Evil 1 - 5 (Missing all the Spin-offs and RE 6) I waited this one to become cheaper expecting to be somehow disappointed by everything except for the graphics. I was Wrong. 5 Min into the game and I was scared out! something this series has not provided me since Resident Evil 3.
customer_reviews.author: Cláudio Alves

customer_reviews.title: Worth Playing
customer_reviews.text: Good game. Some old Resident Evil puzzles creeping back in I was glad to find. Quite scary. Favourite bit is the car in the garage: you’ll love that heh heh!
customer_reviews.author: Steuart Hedington

customer_reviews.title: Boring game so far...
customer_reviews.text: Got bored with this game in less than an hour but will give it another go when I'm bored..

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is really really good. i love the direction Resi has gone after how bad Resi 6 was. There is alot of tension throughout the game and the voice acting is top notch. cant wait for the DLC and Resi 8

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal very spooky game one of the best in the series fast delivery and yet another great deal from the wharehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great game although it links directly to a Steam account ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game although it links directly to a Steam account so I could have just downloaded it from there instead of waiting for this to be delivered!

customer_reviews.title: Good game and came a day early
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early, good game and runs well on my PC with just about everything maxed out hitting a constant 60fps My build: GTX 1060 6GB, I5 7400

customer_reviews.title: True Resident Evil Game
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game. Resident evil back to it's roots. Last third of the game is not as good...but only because the first two thirds are brilliant!

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and whole load of fun!
customer_reviews.text: An refreshing experience the resident evil franchise I recommended any fan not to miss out on this.

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Games in 2017
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Games in 2017! It's a great game for all games, but especially for Horror Game fans!

customer_reviews.text: Very enjoyable but too short. I only like FPS so this was my first resident evil experience. A bit linear but it did make me jump a couple of times and was good fun.

customer_reviews.title: I've already given up on the franchise, but Capcom ...
customer_reviews.text: I've already given up on the franchise, but Capcom really made it.. a true Resident Evil game after a whole decade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, since RE4 that Capcom didnt make such a good resident evil. I miss the zombies though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was expecting nothing but a serial number to put into Steam (which I did anyway as i've Virgin Fibre @ 210mbps down which downlo
customer_reviews.text: Props to Capcom for actually including all necessary install data on 3 DVD's for people with little to no broadband, was expecting nothing but a serial number to put into Steam (which I did anyway as i've Virgin Fibre @ 210mbps down which downloaded this quicker than installing from DVD) Too bad this isn't a true Resident Evil game, this is coming from someone in their 30's who preordered RE1 on the PSX in the late 90's and fell in love upto RE4. RIP indeed.
customer_reviews.author: eb88

customer_reviews.title: very small print: Requires internet connection and free steam ...
customer_reviews.text: very small print: Requires internet connection and free steam account to activate. What is a purpose of buying a physical copy instead digital?
customer_reviews.author: Majo

customer_reviews.title: Thanks SO much
customer_reviews.text: Received today - product code ripped from inside box, meaning I can't actually install the game, not in cellophane despite being labelled as 'new', rendered the game pretty useless and £30 wasted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i just dont get the love for this game
customer_reviews.text: The hipe for this game has been a bandwagon thing, i just dont get the love for this game. It is anything but resident evil. The FPS view of the game is wrong on so many levels and was only implemented due to pressue from sony and the new vr headset. Time for Capcom to look again at the franchise and reboot the whole lot. Shame really as i was really looking forward to this game. Bring on resident evil 2 remake and it better not be FP.
customer_reviews.author: sean ayers

customer_reviews.title: There is no 21:9 support.
customer_reviews.text: There is no 21:9 support. I'm not playing it till it's been updated. If you have a 21:9 ultrawide monitor and can't live with black bars: stay away. 1 star feels a little harsh, but after searching it seems capcom repeatedly ignore the 21:9 community. If capcom release a patch before the widescreen community i'll update the rating, if it's the other way around... I'll leave it as negative.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Resident evil!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the first game in ages that I've really really enjoyed, at times it was frustrating but ultimately alot of fun. It's clearly not like other resident evil games but not so far removed that it doesn't fit in. I spent roughly eleven hours on it and don't feel cheated by the length as some have, I'll give it a few months and play it through again. Graphics aren't anything ground breaking but the atmosphere and game play is what made this game for me. Give it a go!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS GAME!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic game, really scary and an outstanding addition to the Resident Evil series
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fortunate enough to get to play this on pre-release. The game is taking place in 2017 so it’s taking place 4 years after Resident Evil 6. There is a new protagonist called Ethan Winters. This takes us onto the search for Ethan’s missing wife, Mia, which leads him to a derelict plantation mansion, home of the Baker family. The story follows many twists and turns surrounding the mysterious baker family. There are various alternate paths to choose and overall extremely impressed with the game so far and I will add to this review as I get on further with it. Combined with VR some parts are truly scary!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DRM means I won't use or play the game. bad move by Capcom
customer_reviews.text: Once again PC users are held to ransom, by not installing this as a stand alone game, I dont use DRM and will never use Steam when I Don't want it. What a shame and Capcom could sell so many more copies, if they just sold it as a DVD game and players just enter the discs serial number, really annoyed, been waiting this a while, as I have a nearly new PS3 still. may be unfair to put one star, but its the principle of my right to install it on my hard drive and not be bullied into signing details I dont want to share on a data base which could be hacked at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Pat & Mike

product_meta.title: Resident Evil 7 Biohazard (PC DVD)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardResident Evil Biohazard

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
GAMEPLAY OVERVIEW 
Resident Evil 7 Biohazard sets a new course for the Resident Evil series as it leverages its roots and opens the door to a truly terrifying horror experience. The new era of horror is scheduled for release on PlayStation 4 (the full gameplay experience will also be available via the included PlayStation VR Mode), Xbox One and Windows PC. 

Set within a sinister plantation mansion in modern day rural America and taking place after the dramatic events of Resident Evil 6, players experience the terror directly from the first person perspective for the first time in the Resident Evil series. Embodying the iconic gameplay elements of exploration and tense atmosphere that first coined “survival horror” some twenty years ago, Resident Evil 7 biohazard delivers a disturbingly realistic experience that will define the next era in horror entertainment. 
FEATURES: 


 * Opening the doors to a new era of horror – The next major entry in the renowned Resident Evil series makes a dramatic new shift as it comes to next generation consoles, Windows PC and PlayStation VR 
   
 * Returning to the series’ roots - Resident Evil 7 biohazard will deliver an experience reminiscent of the series’ signature gameplay including exploration, puzzles and a realistic tense atmosphere for players to encounter but will offer a complete refresh of the gameplay systems to propel the survival horror experience to the next level 
   
 * Immersive, visceral horror – A new shift for the series to first person view brings the terrifying horror directly up close and personal; PSVR compatibility heightens the chilling experience even more 
   
 * Built from the ground up on the RE Engine – Capcom’s brand new VR compatible development engine works in tandem with industry leading audio and visual technologies to create a disturbingly photorealistic experience for an unprecedented level of immersion 
   
 * Step inside the plantation now on PlayStation Plus – The standalone teaser demo “Beginning Hour” can be downloaded now by PlayStation Plus subscribers, delivering players a taste of what they can expect from Resident Evil 7 biohazard when it releases. 
   



BOX CONTAINS
1 Game Disc

See more
